name: Uneyed
description:
Uneyed - By Preston Nichols

SUNY Polytech October 2021 Game Jam

Uneyed is a 2D platformer game where you cannot see the world around you and instead must use audio clues to navigate. It is heavily recommended you play with earbuds or headphones.

Controls (Explained in-game):

  • D: Step Right
  • A: Step Left
  • Space: Jump
  • W: Climb Up
  • S: Climb Down
  • (Below are not explained in-game):
    • F11: Toggle Fullscreen (Might not work)
    • Esc: Close Game

This build contains 3 levels:

  1.  A Bump in the Dark
  2. Lefts and Ladders
  3. Roaring Robots

On completion of the last stage, you will be taken to the in-game credits where the only option is to close the game.

Used Resources:

  • Made in Unity
    • TextMesh Pro
    • LeanTween
  • Sound Produced With
    • Chiptone
    • Audacity
  • Font: Rounded Elegance
